scripts.start:docker-test: docker run --name eam-api --network host -e PORT=3000 -p 3000:3000 eam-api
scripts.compose:local:push: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml --env-file .env --profile local exec api-local bun run db:push
scripts.compose:local:shell: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml --env-file .env --profile local exec api-local sh
scripts.compose:prod:pull: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml --profile production pull api
scripts.compose:prod:redeploy: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml --profile production up -d --no-deps --force-recreate api
scripts.compose:prod:deploy: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml --profile production exec api bun run db:migrate:deploy
scripts.docker:build: docker build --build-arg GIT_COMMIT=$(git rev-parse --short=8 HEAD) --build-arg BUILD_DATE=$(date -u +'%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ') -t eam-api:latest .
